post_text:
Last spring was our first ever car show and we were beyond ecstatic of the turn out and response from the community. Obviously after having such a great time we were looking forward to hosting our second annual car show this year. Sadly the world works in mysterious ways and due to COVID-19 we are unable to, in good conscience host an in person event this year,

That being said we have decided to host this years car show digitally and hope to give the community a fun outlet to share their love of classic cars! We will be sharing and highlighting vehicles via Instagram to give the best possible experience for exploring the communities coolest cars. Just like last year there will be prizes for both the people entering their cars into the show and a giveaway for anyone virtually attending that follows us on Facebook and Instagram! Stay tuned for more information coming on Monday, June 1st, and be sure to follow us here https://www.instagram.com/paul.cole.motors/ on Instagram to stay up to date and be ready for the fun to begin!
